Steps.step1: Start by creating your translation files in the {folder} folder. Each file (e.g., {example1}, {example2}) should contain the key-value pairs for translations.
Steps.step2: Add compatible routers in the {file} file to display pages that match the language.
Steps.step3: Wrap your application with {provider} in {layout}. This provides translation context to your app. (Already added)
Steps.step4: Use the {hook} hook in your components or pages to access localized strings.
Steps.step5: Save your files and test by switching between languages in the URL (e.g., {url1}, {url2}).
